meanings.definition: A Chinese herb used in traditional medicine.
meanings.sent1: The mahuang is known for its healing properties.
meanings.sent2: In ancient times, people relied on mahuang for its medicinal benefits.
meanings.sent3: The mahuang plant decided to open a clinic to treat other plants.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like mahuang, bringing comfort and relief to all around her.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of mahuang filled the room, soothing everyone's ailments.

meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Ephedra.
meanings.sent1: The mahuang plant grows in arid regions.
meanings.sent2: Hikers often come across the mahuang plant during their desert treks.
meanings.sent3: The mahuang plant waved to its cactus neighbors in the desert.
meanings.sent4: The mahuang plant stood tall like a guardian in the dry landscape.
meanings.sent5: The green hue of the mahuang plant contrasted beautifully with the sandy surroundings.

meanings.definition: The dried stems of Ephedra sinica, used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: The mahuang stems are carefully harvested for their medicinal value.
meanings.sent2: Traditional healers prepare remedies using dried mahuang stems.
meanings.sent3: The mahuang stems threw a party to celebrate their healing powers.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the mahuang stems, unwavering in adversity.
meanings.sent5: The mahuang stems whispered ancient secrets of wellness to those who listened.
